item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 24, 2024 at 9:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Quantized Llama models with increased speed and a reduced memory footprint (92 points | 18 comments)
2. Show HN: TypeSchema – A JSON specification to describe data models (37 points | 15 comments)
3. Official Raspberry Pi NVMe SSD Review (46 points | 23 comments)
4. Launch HN: Skyvern (YC S23) – open-source AI agent for browser automations (176 points | 41 comments)
5. Security research on Private Cloud Compute (107 points | 20 comments)
6. Viva Labs (YC W22) Is Hiring Video/Image AI Research Lead ( | hide)
7. Brush – a new super compatible Gaussian splatting engine in Rust (33 points | 4 comments)
8. Zigler: Zig NIFs in Elixir (80 points | 29 comments)
9. Never Missing the Train Again (92 points | 24 comments)
10. Post World War II Food (99 points | 68 comments)
11. Data viz project that maps all earthquakes by magnitude (31 points | 5 comments)
12. The Lion of St. Mark's Square in Venice Is Chinese (61 points | 23 comments)
13. Lingo: A Go micro language framework for building Domain Specific Languages (15 points | 1 comment)
14. Boeing 787s must be reset every 51 days or 'misleading data' is shown to pilots (47 points | 26 comments)
15. Show HN: 2048 turned 10 this year, I built an updated version to celebrate (310 points | 138 comments)
16. Riot Games: Peeking into Valorant's Netcode (2020) (100 points | 39 comments)
17. Quit Social Media (9 points | 2 comments)
18. Rider is now free for non-commercial use (556 points | 271 comments)
19. Show HN: PreCog AI – Automatic AI Model Selection for Any Task (29 points | 14 comments)
20. Cable companies ask 5th Circuit to block FTC's click-to-cancel rule (161 points | 114 comments)
21. LibLISA – Instruction Discovery and Analysis on x86-64 (11 points | discuss)
22. The Anvil Text Editor (61 points | 47 comments)
23. Dynamic Models of Gentrification (20 points | 10 comments)
24. Throw more AI at your problems (54 points | 31 comments)
25. Why did you write a new RTOS for CHERIoT? (27 points | 5 comments)
26. Claude Computer Use – Is Vision the Ultimate API? (54 points | 55 comments)
27. Show HN: Desktop Sandbox for Secure Cloud Computer Use (21 points | 2 comments)
28. Fast Development with Zed and Dev Containers (6 points | 1 comment)
29. Calculating the norm of a complex number (28 points | 13 comments)
30. Show HN: RF Hunter – Find hidden cameras and other devices (389 points | 124 comments)
